activities:
McKesson Technologies Inc.'s Safe Harbor certification covers two business units: 1) Imaging and Workflow Solutions (IWS) and 2) McKesson Health Solutions (MHS). 

IWS may view, hold and process personal information about EU customers and EU business partners for the provision, implementation and support of health care information technology to health care institutions and companies in the EU.  This includes the processing of sensitive information (as defined by the Safe Harbor Framework) provided by EU customers about their patients to McKesson for the purposes of fulfilling McKesson’s contractual obligations to its EU customers. 

MHS may view, hold and process personal information about EU customers and EU business partners for the provision, implementation and support of health care information technology to health care institutions and companies in the EU. This includes the processing of sensitive information (as defined by the Safe Harbor Framework) provided by EU customers about their patients to McKesson for the purposes of fulfilling McKesson’s contractual obligations to its EU customers. The products in-scope under MHS are: 1) InterQual; 2) InterQual Review Manager; 3) InterQual Learning Source; and 4) InterQual Interrater Reliability Suite.
corpofftitle1: Executive V.P., General Counsel & Chief Compliance Officer
